name: Cooking Time 2 - Sushi Make&Preschool kids games!
name_original: Cooking Time 2 - Sushi Make&Preschool kids games!
description:
cooking Time - Sushi Make it’s a game where your kids can cook 7 Different Japanese Foods. This game was designed to be child-friendly! There are no complicated menus for kids to get confused by, or multiple options to get lost in. Cooking Time - Sushi Make is a fun cooking game for children of all age's.

FEATURES
- 7 Different Japanese Foods: Gimbap, Egg Dumplings, Rice Roll, Squid Sushi, Eel Sushi, Caviar Sushi and Salmon Sushi.
- 2 cute characters to cook with your kids.
- Fully child-friendly game design and user interface.
- No in-app purchases.

YOU CAN PLAY:
- Choose the character you like.
- Choose foods that you are going to cook.
- Follow the prompts, and use your creativity to complete your creation.

It is time for delicious food, let's start!
